name: extended-listbox
description: A simple to use jQuery plugin as powerful alternative to the HTML <select> tag
author: Christian Kotzbauer

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run build:prod
scripts.prepare-tests: npm run build && tsc --project tsconfig.test.json && node build/scripts/generate-test.js
scripts.test:dev: npm run prepare-tests && node node_modules/testem/testem.js dev
scripts.test:ci: npm run prepare-tests && node node_modules/testem/testem.js ci
scripts.lint: node node_modules/tslint/bin/tslint -c tslint.json --project tsconfig.json -t verbose -o tslint.txt
